mapper.select: select distinct ge.cId,g.cClass,g.cYearClass,m.cMajorName,c.cCollegeName, et.cExperimentName from gy_report_grade_exam ge,gy_report_grade g,gy_report_major m, gy_report_experimental_test et,gy_report_college c where ge.cExperimentId=et.cId and g.cCollegeId=c.cId and g.cMajorId=m.cId and g.cId=ge.cGradeId ORDER BY ge.cId DESC

select distinct ge.cStatus,ge.cId,g.cClass,g.cYearClass,m.cMajorName,c.cCollegeName, et.cExperimentName from gy_report_grade_exam ge,gy_report_grade g,gy_report_major m, gy_report_experimental_test et,gy_report_college c where ge.cExperimentId=et.cId and g.cCollegeId=c.cId and g.cMajorId=m.cId and g.cId=ge.cGradeId and ge.cGradeId=#{cGradeId}

select COUNT(*) from gy_report_report rt,gy_report_student stu,gy_report_experimental_test el ,gy_report_grade_exam ge where rt.cStudentId=stu.cUserId and rt.cExperimentTextId=el.cId and ge.cExperimentId=el.cId and ge.cGradeId=stu.cGradeId and ge.cGradeId=#{0} and ge.cExperimentId=#{1}
select distinct ge.cId,ge.cGradeId,ge.cExperimentId, et.cExperimentName from gy_report_grade_exam ge, gy_report_experimental_test et where ge.cExperimentId=et.cId and ge.cGradeId=#{cGradeId}
